extension.summary: Apply custom PseudoTV Live fonts and patch skin files.
extension.description: Install Custom PseudoTV Live Fonts and Patch Kodi Skin to remove unwanted dialogs[CR] Patcher only alters files used by PseudoTV Live and will not harm/impact/effect Kodi
extension.disclaimer: This software is a BETA release, bugs maybe common until final release.[CR]
